constants.name: NotNullIfArticleAttachedDescription
constants.value: This field is designed to clarify the previous constant. NotNullIfArticleAttached has to be null when no articles are attached to the case and not null otherwise. It is used in Service Knowledge. The field to use for production is CaseArticle.CaseId.

constants.name: ClosedDateDescription
constants.value: This field is designed to clarify the previous constant. ClosedDate is the closeddate used in Service Knowledge, value then can be changed for demo purposes (if bad data on closed date). The field to use for production is ClosedDate.

constants.name: LastPeriodsDescription
constants.value: This field is designed to clarify the two previous constants. LastPeriod and BeforeLastPeriod defines the two last periods of focus, enabling us to evaluate evolution on a number. They are used in most service dashboards, where there is changes in percentage (e.g. Overview). The fields to use for production are 1 week ago and 2 week ago
